this_title: All the Time In The World
trans_title: 远离尘嚣——摆脱时间束缚的苏珊一家
introduction: Featuring the insights for three children (aged 10, 8 and 4), a family leaves the comforts of home to live for 9 months in the remote wilderness of the Canadian North. They spend the long northern winter living in a small cabin with no road access, no electricity, no running water, no internet and not a single watch or clock.
chinese_title: 远离尘嚣——摆脱时间束缚的苏珊一家
foreign_title: All the Time In The World
